Cerebellum Purkinje cell.Located in: Purkinje cell layer of cerebellar cortex
Cerebellum Purkinje cell.AxonLength: Mouse: up to 2 mm.  Rat: up to 3 mm.
Cerebellum Purkinje cell.LocationOfLocalAxonArborization: Purkinje cell layer of cerebellar cortex
DendriteThickness: Mouse: thick trunk (2-5 um); thin branches (0.5-1 um).  Rat: Thick trunk (3-6 um)
Cerebellum Purkinje cell.SubcellularSynapticTarget: Local: cell bodies; distant: cell bodies and dendrites
Cerebellum Purkinje cell.Definition: Principal neuron (projection neuron) of the cerebellar cortex; cell bodies arranged in a single layer; characterized by a pear-shaped cell body, 1 (rarely 2) primary dendrites and an elaborate dendritic tree heavily invested with dendritic spines.
